nodes.text: Kelkon Slavir was a Human commander of the Alliance to Restore the Republic who was killed during the Battle of Hoth.

A Human named Kelkon Selavir served as a commander in the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. During that time, Selavir was stationed at the Alliance High Command's secret Echo Base on the Outer Rim ice planet of Hoth. Commander Selavir later participated in the Battle of Hoth, while stationed at the end of one of the base's hallways. Along with Major Kenki Spriow, Lieutenant Scohen Shnaus, Captain Scodo Simas, and Lieutenant Alebry Slemic, Selavir was among the defenders killed by an Imperial sharpshooter during the course of the battle.

Kelkon Selavir was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
